title: ‘Hacks’ Season Finale, Plus ‘In the Heights’ at the Box Office
description:
Chris and Andy discuss the reported box office performance of ‘In the Heights’ (5:46). Then they talk about the end of the first season of ‘Hacks’ and what they want to see from the show moving forward (18:35).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Richie Bozek
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
